page.title: 08Famous Personalities
page.content: Our area is perhaps very average in that it does not have any really outstanding personalities although there have been visits made by several important people. The Duke of Edinburgh opened the Youth Club attached to the local secondary school. Cliff Richard is a personal friend of the local vicar and he has been to stay at the local rectory. Tessa Sanderson winner of the womens javelin gold medal at the 1984 Olympics visited the school to promote an appeal for funds to send athletes to the Los Angeles Olympics.
